content.15: The prediction mask of the ground truth PERSON region is quite good overall, but it appears slightly over-segmented in several areas, particularly around the edges and within the internal details of the face and body. The boundaries are less defined and more irregular compared to the ground truth, leading to a rougher appearance.
content.18: The prediction mask of the ground truth SOFA region is quite rough and imprecise, especially on the boundaries. The prediction seems to under-segment the SOFA region on the left, while over-segmenting it on the right, creating a jagged and irregular shape.

content.5: The prediction mask of the ground truth BOTTLE region is quite good, but it exhibits some irregularities and over-segmentation, especially on the bottom. content.8: The prediction mask of the ground truth CAT region is quite similar to the ground truth, but it appears slightly smoother and less detailed. Additionally, some small details and irregularities present in the ground truth CAT mask are missing in the prediction.
content.11: The prediction mask of the ground truth DININGTABLE region is quite similar to the ground truth, but it's slightly rougher and less detailed, especially on the bottom-left. content.7: The prediction mask of the ground truth CAR region is quite noisy and imprecise. It appears as a few scattered white pixels, while the ground truth CAR region is more continuous and well-defined. The prediction seems to have missed most of the CAR, only capturing a small portion of it.

content.10: Overall, the prediction captured the COW region well, but the boundaries are less defined and more irregular than in the ground truth. Specifically, the prediction seems to under-segment the bottom-right part of the COW, while over-segmenting the top-left.

content.9: The prediction mask of the ground truth CHAIR regions is generally good, but lacks detail and precision. The boundaries are rougher and less defined, especially on the top of the chairs. The prediction also seems to have missed some parts of the chairs, resulting in under-segmentation, while some areas around the chairs have been over-segmented.
content.11: The prediction mask of the ground truth DININGTABLE region is significantly incomplete.
